title: Help ID me!
content:
Anyone have an idea what faces these are?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [works.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123620/http:/typophile.com/files/works.jpg) | 93.8 KB |
| [40bond.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123620/http:/typophile.com/files/40bond.jpg) | 40.47 KB |

 [‹ (x) Jim Esch for Congress - Target {Stephen, Duncan (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123620/http:/typophile.com/node/32757 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Proudly" hand drawn sans - Enviro {Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123620/http:/typophile.com/node/32806 "Go to next forum topic")
author: et al.

comments.content:
40 Bond is Sammy Roman by Matthew Carter! (ITS NOT A CUSTOM BIG CASLON)

It was commissioned by DynaLab Taiwan but they don’t sell it anymore.
side point= in 40 bond. The designer is using the letter O not zero for 40.
I did look at Big Caslon for that! But it wasn’t light enough.

nevermind- its not, just another modded Big Caslon

:-(
And that was another thing that threw me, the 0 in Big Caslon has no stresses.
